front.title: IKEv2 based flow control extension of PMIPv6

abstract.t: PMIPv6 is designed to provide network based mobility, it requries nochanges to the UE. There are proposals to extend PMIPv6 to supportflow mobility. Flow mobility requries the UE and the network havingcommunication protocol to carry the flow control messages. Thisdocument proposes to use the extended IKEv2 protocol to carry theflow control messages between the UE and network.
